mapper.select: SELECT PB_SNO AS pbSno, TITLE AS title, SUB_TITLE AS subTitle, MAIN_PHOTO_URL AS mainPhotoUrl, DESC AS desc, ABOUT_ME AS aboutMe, LOCATION AS location, AROUND_THE_WEB AS aroundTheWeb, GITHUB AS github, FACEBOOK AS facebook, TWITTER AS twitter, GOOGLE_PLUS AS googlePlus, LINKED_IN AS linkedIn, COPYLIGHT AS copylight FROM TB_SETUP ORDER BY PB_SNO DESC LIMIT 1
